fullText: Ink is a fascinating look at the birth of modern tabloid journalism, anchored by two powerhouse performances from Bertie Carvel and Jonny Lee Miller.
dtliExcerpt: Ink is a fascinating look at the birth of modern tabloid journalism, anchored by two powerhouse performances from Bertie Carvel and Jonny Lee Miller.
